description: Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center is a skilled Naturopathic Care Center in Norwalk and Southbury, CT. Accepting new appointments. Call today or request an appointment on our website.
cleaned_text: Welcome To Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center in Norwalk, Connecticut, is a naturopathic medicine practice led by Shyron Alston, ND, serving Norwalk, Westport, Darien, and Southbury, CT. The practice specializes in supporting patients of all ages with neurodevelopmental disorders using natural therapies. At Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center, Dr. Alston is a FirstLine Therapy® provider for medical weight loss, and the practice is special-needs friendly. Dr. Alston helps patients with attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), autism, and other neurodevelopmental disorders, as well as those struggling with thyroid disorders, obesity, anxiety, and chronic diseases. Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center offers personalized treatment plans after working closely with patients to create an environment of understanding and support. The goal is for patients to live healthy, happy lives without any limitations. Our Services [](/services/) Pediatric Care Here at Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center, we are proud to provide pediatric care to the little ones of our community! Our naturopathic physician, Dr. Shyron Alston, diagnoses and treats a wide range of pediatric health conditions. Pediatric care is important to ensure the proper development and growth in children. We are your one-stop-shop for all of your child's naturopathic health care needs. From well check ups to acute and chronic treatment for illnesses, we are here to help your child experience a healthy life.Learn More [](/services/) Anxiety Anxiety is defined by the American Psychological Association (APA) as "an emotion characterized by feelings of tension, worried thoughts, and physical changes like increased blood pressure." It affects approximately 40 million Americans, or 18.1% of the population, making it the most commonly diagnosed mental illness in the country.Learn More About Our Office Dr. Alston commits herself to help patients reach their full potential with therapies that promote wellness and a good balance of physical, mental, and emotional health. Examples include specialty lab testing, hydrotherapy, and infrared light therapies, as well as botanical (herbal) medicine. To schedule an appointment with Be Balanced Naturopathic Care Center, call the office or schedule an appointment online today.
